description: Try our easy to follow Cookie Parfait with Caramel Sauce recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Parfait,High fibre,High protein,Seafood free,Low salt,Sesame free,Quick & easy dessert
name: Cookie Parfait with Caramel Sauce Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place butter, sugar, condensed milk and golden syrup into a small saucepan and stir over low heat until sugar has dissolved. Bring to the boil and cook for 5 mins or until the mixture is golden. Stir in cream until smooth and cook for 1-2 mins or until it has thickened. Cool slightly.
Divide crushed biscuits into the base of 6 tall dessert glasses. Top with banana slices, a scoop of ice-cream, toasted pecans and caramel sauce.
Top with another scoop of ice-cream and more caramel sauce and decorate with pecans.
